dateline.placeName: Brighton2CD was staying at 148 King's Road, Brighton, from 10 to 19 Mar; he returned to London on 20 Mar.

body.p: Mr Charles Dickens presents his compliments to Mr Gridley, and regrets that his absence from town, prevents his having the pleasure of receiving Mr Gridley's visit. Otherwise, he would have been very happy to do so
